'''''Mallorn'' 14''' is the fourteenth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s annual journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)|Mallorn]]'', published in [[1980]].

==Contents==
* Cover Illustration
** By: [[Pauline Baynes]]
* Editorial
** By: [[Susan Rule]]
* [[The Silmarillion by J.R.R. Tolkien: A Brief Account of the Book and its Making|''The Silmarillion'', by J.R.R. Tolkien: A brief account of the book and its making]]
** By: [[Christopher Tolkien]]
* 'Huan and Luthien'
** By: Kevin Young
* ''Magic''
** By: Gordon MacLellan
* Follow-On
** By: A. Appleyard
** By: Ashfaq Mashhadi
* Review of ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: Scholar and Storyteller|J.R.R. Tolkien Scholar & Storyteller: Essays in Memoriam]]'' (Salu & Farrell)
** By: [[Charles Noad|Charles E. Noad]]
* Morgothword
** By: Steve Pillinger
* ''Wood-wraith''
** By: Andrea Todkill
* Middle-earth — a Chessboard?
** By: Philip Oliver
* Solution to Morgothword
* English in Fëanorian
** By: David Masson
* 'Anar'
** By: John Trippick
* 'Moria Gate'
** By: Ruud Verkerk
* ''Hymn to Eärendil''
** By: Pat Masson

* Inside Art
** By: Steve Pillinger, Lucy Matthews, Lester Simons, [[Wayne G. Hammond|Wayne Hammond]]
